OrgName: Briggs & Stratton Corporation and Briggs & Stratton Power Products Group, LLC.
PPLoc: Corporate Intranet; see also link below
activities: The organization processes employees' personal information for any and all employment-related purposes, including, but not limited to, workforce management; administering compensation, payroll, benefits and expense reports; administering physical and information systems security; addressing various legal obligations related to the employment relationship; and to administer training. The organization also processes independent contractors' information for any and all purposes related to the administration of the independent contractor relationship.
eucountries: Austria, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resources data (manually processed, off-line and on-line)
recoursemech: E.U. Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
